name: PunkBeer
0:
”Alexa, ask Punk Beer to grab me a random beer”
”Alexa, ask Punk Beer to tell me about beer number eighteen”
”Alexa, ask Punk Beer to crack a cold one”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: punk beer
des:
Have a craving for a ice cold beer, but want to try something new? Let Punk Beer do the work for you!

Ask Punk Beer for a new beer, and Alexa will happily suggest something new and exciting for you to try. You will get to hear all about the inspiration behind the brew and flavors, and will also be told the ABV content so you can see if this beer is for you. 

Have an old favorite that Punk Beer suggested? Simply use the ID that Alexa includes with every beer suggestion to recall that exciting choice in the future!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
